verses.verse: I am the man <WH1397> that hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> affliction <WH6040> by the rod <WH7626> of his wrath <WH5678>.
He hath led <WH5090> <WH8804> me, and brought <WH3212> <WH8686> me into darkness <WH2822>, but not into light <WH216>.
Surely against me is he turned <WH7725> <WH8799>; he turneth <WH2015> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> against me all the day <WH3117>.
My flesh <WH1320> and my skin <WH5785> hath he made old <WH1086> <WH8765>; he hath broken <WH7665> <WH8765> my bones <WH6106>.
He hath builded against <WH1129> <WH8804> me, and compassed <WH5362> <WH8686> me with gall <WH7219> and travail <WH8513>.
He hath set <WH3427> <WH8689> me in dark places <WH4285>, as they that be dead <WH4191> <WH8801> of old <WH5769>.
He hath hedged <WH1443> <WH8804> me about, that I cannot get out <WH3318> <WH8799>: he hath made my chain <WH5178> heavy <WH3513> <WH8689>.
Also when I cry <WH2199> <WH8799> and shout <WH7768> <WH8762>, he shutteth out <WH5640> <WH8804> my prayer <WH8605>.
He hath inclosed <WH1443> <WH8804> my ways <WH1870> with hewn stone <WH1496>, he hath made my paths <WH5410> crooked <WH5753> <WH8765>.
He was unto me as a bear <WH1677> lying in wait <WH693> <WH8802>, and as a lion <WH738> in secret places <WH4565>.
He hath turned aside <WH5493> <WH8790> my ways <WH1870>, and pulled me in pieces <WH6582> <WH8762>: he hath made <WH7760> <WH8804> me desolate <WH8074> <WH8802>.
He hath bent <WH1869> <WH8804> his bow <WH7198>, and set <WH5324> <WH8686> me as a mark <WH4307> for the arrow <WH2671>.
He hath caused the arrows <WH1121> of his quiver <WH827> to enter <WH935> <WH8689> into my reins <WH3629>.
I was a derision <WH7814> to all my people <WH5971>; and their song <WH5058> all the day <WH3117>.
He hath filled <WH7646> <WH8689> me with bitterness <WH4844>, he hath made me drunken <WH7301> <WH8689> with wormwood <WH3939>.
He hath also broken <WH1638> <WH8686> my teeth <WH8127> with gravel stones <WH2687>, he hath covered <WH3728> <WH8689> me with ashes <WH665>.
And thou hast removed <WH2186> my soul <WH5315> far off <WH2186> <WH8799> from peace <WH7965>: I forgat <WH5382> <WH8804> prosperity <WH2896>.
And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, My strength <WH5331> and my hope <WH8431> is perished <WH6> <WH8804> from the YY <WH3068>:
Remembering <WH2142> <WH8798> mine affliction <WH6040> and my misery <WH4788>, the wormwood <WH3939> and the gall <WH7219>.
My soul <WH5315> hath them still <WH2142> <WH8800> in remembrance <WH2142> <WH8799>, and is humbled <WH7743> <WH8686> in me.
This I recall <WH7725> <WH8686> to my mind <WH3820>, therefore have I hope <WH3176> <WH8686>.
It is of the YY'S <WH3068> mercies <WH2617> that we are not consumed <WH8552> <WH8804>, because his compassions <WH7356> fail <WH3615> <WH8804> not.
They are new <WH2319> every morning <WH1242>: great <WH7227> is thy faithfulness <WH530>.
The YY <WH3068> is my portion <WH2506>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> my soul <WH5315>; therefore will I hope <WH3176> <WH8686> in him.
The YY <WH3068> is good <WH2896> unto them that wait <WH6960> <WH8802> for him, to the soul <WH5315> that seeketh <WH1875> <WH8799> him.
It is good <WH2896> that a man should both hope <WH3175> <WH8675> <WH2342> <WH8799> and quietly wait <WH1748> for the salvation <WH8668> of the YY <WH3068>.
It is good <WH2896> for a man <WH1397> that he bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the yoke <WH5923> in his youth <WH5271>.
He sitteth <WH3427> <WH8799> alone <WH910> and keepeth silence <WH1826> <WH8799>, because he hath borne <WH5190> <WH8804> it upon him.
He putteth <WH5414> <WH8799> his mouth <WH6310> in the dust <WH6083>; if so be there may be <WH3426> hope <WH8615>.
He giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> his cheek <WH3895> to him that smiteth <WH5221> <WH8688> him: he is filled full <WH7646> <WH8799> with reproach <WH2781>.
For the YY <WH136> will not cast off <WH2186> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>:
But though he cause grief <WH3013> <WH8689>, yet will he have compassion <WH7355> <WH8765> according to the multitude <WH7230> of his mercies <WH2617>.
For he doth not afflict <WH6031> <WH8765> willingly <WH3820> nor grieve <WH3013> <WH8762> the children <WH1121> of men <WH376>.
To crush <WH1792> <WH8763> under his feet <WH7272> all the prisoners <WH615> of the earth <WH776>,
To turn aside <WH5186> <WH8687> the right <WH4941> of a man <WH1397> before the face <WH6440> of Ha `Elyon <WH5945>,
To subvert <WH5791> <WH8763> a man <WH120> in his cause <WH7379>, the YY <WH136> approveth <WH7200> <WH8804> not.
Who is he that saith <WH559> <WH8804>, and it cometh to pass, when the YY <WH136> commandeth <WH6680> <WH8765> it not?
Out of the mouth <WH6310> of Ha `Elyon <WH5945> proceedeth <WH3318> <WH8799> not evil <WH7451> and good <WH2896> ?
Wherefore doth a living <WH2416> man <WH120> complain <WH596> <WH8691>, a man <WH1397> for the punishment of his sins <WH2399> ?
Let us search <WH2664> <WH8799> and try <WH2713> <WH8799> our ways <WH1870>, and turn again <WH7725> <WH8799> to the YY <WH3068>.
Let us lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> our heart <WH3824> with our hands <WH3709> unto 'Elohim <WH410> in the heavens <WH8064>.
We <WH5168> have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> and have rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804>: thou hast not pardoned <WH5545> <WH8804>.
Thou hast covered <WH5526> <WH8804> with anger <WH639>, and persecuted <WH7291> <WH8799> us: thou hast slain <WH2026> <WH8804>, thou hast not pitied <WH2550> <WH8804>.
Thou hast covered <WH5526> <WH8804> thyself with a cloud <WH6051>, that our prayer <WH8605> should not pass through <WH5674> <WH8800>.
Thou hast made <WH7760> <WH8799> us as the offscouring <WH5501> and refuse <WH3973> in the midst <WH7130> of the people <WH5971>.
All our enemies <WH341> <WH8802> have opened <WH6475> <WH8804> their mouths <WH6310> against us.
Fear <WH6343> and a snare <WH6354> is come upon us, desolation <WH7612> and destruction <WH7667>.
Mine eye <WH5869> runneth down <WH3381> <WH8799> with rivers <WH6388> of water <WH4325> for the destruction <WH7667> of the daughter <WH1323> of my people <WH5971>.
Mine eye <WH5869> trickleth down <WH5064> <WH8738>, and ceaseht <WH1820> <WH8799> not, without any intermission <WH2014>,
Till the YY <WH3068> look down <WH8259> <WH8686>, and behold <WH7200> <WH8799> from heaven <WH8064>.
Mine eye <WH5869> affecteth <WH5953> <WH8782> mine heart <WH5315> because of all the daughters <WH1323> of my city <WH5892>.
Mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> chased <WH6679> <WH8804> me sore <WH6679> <WH8800>, like a bird <WH6833>, without cause <WH2600>.
They have cut off <WH6789> <WH8804> my life <WH2416> in the dungeon <WH953>, and cast <WH3034> <WH8762> a stone <WH68> upon me.
Waters <WH4325> flowed over <WH6687> <WH8804> mine head <WH7218>; then I said <WH559> <WH8804>, I am cut off <WH1504> <WH8738>.
I called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon thy name <WH8034>, O YY <WH3068>, out of the low <WH8482> dungeon <WH953>.
Thou hast heard <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>: hide <WH5956> <WH8686> not thine ear <WH241> at my breathing <WH7309>, at my cry <WH7775>.
Thou drewest near <WH7126> <WH8804> in the day <WH3117> that I called <WH7121> <WH8799> upon thee: thou saidst <WH559> <WH8804>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not.
O YY <WH136>, thou hast pleaded <WH7378> <WH8804> the causes <WH7379> of my soul <WH5315>; thou hast redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804> my life <WH2416>.
O YY <WH3068>, thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804> my wrong <WH5792>: judge <WH8199> <WH8798> thou my cause <WH4941>.
Thou hast seen <WH7200> <WH8804> all their vengeance <WH5360> and all their imaginations <WH4284> against me.
Thou hast heard <WH8085> <WH8804> their reproach <WH2781>, O YY <WH3068>, and all their imaginations <WH4284> against me;
The lips <WH8193> of those that rose up <WH6965> <WH8801> against me, and their device <WH1902> against me all the day <WH3117>.
Behold <WH5027> <WH8685> their sitting down <WH3427> <WH8800>, and their rising up <WH7012>; I am their musick <WH4485>.
Render <WH7725> <WH8686> unto them a recompence <WH1576>, O YY <WH3068>, according to the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>.
Give <WH5414> <WH8799> them sorrow <WH4044> of heart <WH3820>, thy curse <WH8381> unto them.
Persecute <WH7291> <WH8799> and destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> them in anger <WH639> from under the heavens <WH8064> of the YY <WH3068>.
